bug.author: camgian
bug.description: Following installation instructions get this error. tflow-ws:~# ./labelme_on_docker Traceback (most recent call last): File "./labelme_on_docker", line 13, in from labelme.logger import logger ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'labelme'

comments.comment: Thank you for the report! <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/pull/356>#356</denchmark-link> will fix this.
